definitions: the quality of being personal, especially a theory or system based on subjective ideas or applications

examples.text: his sculpture investigating pure form from which all expressive personalism was eliminated

definitions: allegiance to a person, especially a political leader, rather than to a party or ideology

examples.text: this personalism alone can explain the shifting alliances that so confuse observers

shortDefinitions: allegiance to political leader rather than party

definitions: a system of thought which maintains the primacy of the human or divine person on the basis that reality has meaning only through the conscious mind.
shortDefinitions: theory maintaining primacy of human or divine person
